Posts.Content: Mar 16, 2011 08:34PM - edited Mar 16, 2011 08:37PM by GAnne49 Currently every three months for blood and a feel. I'm 1 year from diagnosis and still testing clear after lumpectomy, NO nodes removed.  Looks like we will do a chest Xray once a year along with the mammo.  Oh, just noticed - I was Stage II, barely not IV so my situation is a bit different.  Good luck everyone.
Posts.Title: survey: how often do you see your oncologist? kristinpianista Lena
